text: Karl Harst (fl. 1540) was a sixteenth-century diplomat from the German Duchy of Cleves. He was the Duke of Cleves' representative in London during the marriage of Henry VIII of England and his fourth wife, Anne of Cleves.David Starkey, p.639, Six Wives: The Queens of Henry VIII ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:16th- century German people Category:People of the Tudor period
title: Karl Harst
